ComicInfo.Summary:
What dire instruction from glamourpuss compelled David Slim to create (She's Adorable! She's Terrifying!) Dark Knigut Glamourtween? What does glamourpuss have to say about Mary-Kate Olsen and Ashley Olsen's book, Influence, in glamourpuss Book Club (smuggled out of her rehab clinic on clinic memo pads)? And did Gone With The Wind's Margaret Mitchell actually create the photorealism strip, The Heart of Juliet Jones? Only one way to find out, girlfriend!
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/glamourpuss-8/4000-165431/
ComicInfo.Title: Women Under the Influence
